name: Classic
description: The only card back you’ll ever need.

name: Pandaria
description: Hearthstone is a very popular game in Pandaria.  Official card game of the Shado-Pan!
howToGet: Acquired from achieving Rank 20 in Ranked Play, April 2014.

name: Black Temple
description: “Fel Flame Green” is always in fashion at the Black Temple.
howToGet: Acquired from achieving Rank 20 in Ranked Play, May 2014.

name: Rainbow!
description: Unfortunately, the rainbow generator can only produce oval rainbows.  Gnomish technology still has a ways to go.
howToGet: Acquired from achieving Rank 20 in Ranked Play, June 2014.

name: Fireside
description: A generous gift from the Innkeeper.  He loves to see his guests having a good time together.
howToGet: Play three matches against players on the same local network as you. (Must have at least 3 players on that network!)

name: Legend
description: Wow.  Hardcore.
howToGet: Acquired from achieving Legend Rank in Ranked Play.

name: Naxxramas
description: The gooey center is Ooze slime.  Don’t lick it.
howToGet: Acquired from achieving Rank 20 in Ranked Play, July 2014.

name: Heroic Naxxramas
description: You can tell a lot about an Abomination by his stitching.  This one just screams “insane”.  Literally.
howToGet: Acquired from completing the Curse of Naxxramas in Heroic mode.

name: Icecrown
description: In the frozen heart of Icecrown Citadel, a hero’s mettle will be tested.  Bring a parka.
howToGet: Acquired from achieving Rank 20 in Ranked Play, August 2014.

name: Pirates!
description: Treasure.  Grog.  Hooks for hands.  Way better than Ninjas!
howToGet: Acquired from achieving Rank 20 in Ranked Play, September 2014.

name: Hallow's End
description: The Hallow’s End candy bucket!  Or the Headless Horseman’s spare head!  Stick your hand in and find out.
howToGet: Acquired from achieving Rank 20 in Ranked Play, October 2014.

name: Goblins
description: 4 out of 5 goblins agree: This card back doesn’t explode!
howToGet: Acquired from achieving Rank 20 in Ranked Play, November 2014.

name: Blizzard 2014
description: The year Hearthstone was born.  What a great year!
howToGet: Acquired by participating in Blizzard events during 2014.

name: Dalaran Flame
description: Mascot of Dalaran University.  Rarely seen, because no one ever shows up to football games there.
howToGet: Acquired by participating in TeSPA or other college affiliate program.

name: Warlords
description: When they aren’t plotting to kill everyone and take over the world, even the Iron Horde enjoy a game of Hearthstone.
howToGet: Acquired from Warlords of Draeneor Digital Deluxe Edition.

name: Gnomes
description: This multifunctional device also works as a gnomish army knife, a shoe horn and a pass to the Deeprun Tram.  Gnomish ingenuity!
howToGet: Acquired from achieving Rank 20 in Ranked Play, December 2014.

name: Maraad
description: Vindicator Maraad was a paladin of great courage and strength.  Don’t let the pretty pastel tones fool you.
howToGet: Acquired from achieving Rank 20 in Ranked Play, January 2015.

name: Lunar New Year
description: Happy New Year!
howToGet: Acquired from achieving Rank 20 in Ranked Play, February 2015.

name: Molten Core
description: The Molten Core of Azeroth and not a chocolate lava cake, unfortunately.
howToGet: Was acquired from pre-purchase of Blackrock Mountain.

name: Ragnaros
description: The Firelord is most often seen relaxing in his hot tub, even when he’s trying to burn down the world.
howToGet: Acquired from achieving Rank 20 in Ranked Play, March 2015.

name: Golden Celebration
description: Solid gold, baby.
howToGet: Acquired with a high level finish in approved eSports events.

name: Nefarian
description: You didn’t actually believe someone named “Lord Victor Nefarious” wasn’t up to anything nefarious, did you?
howToGet: Acquired from completing Blackrock Mountain in Heroic mode.

name: Cupcake
description: “Is that a cupcake on a cake?” you ask?  Yes.  Yes it is.
howToGet: Acquired from achieving Rank 20 in Ranked Play, April 2015.

name: Ninjas!
description: Stealth.  Style.  Shurikens.  Way better than Pirates!
howToGet: Acquired from achieving Rank 20 in Ranked Play, May 2015.

name: Heroes of the Storm
description: This arrived for you from the Nexus.  Might want to watch out for those whirling blade thingies.
howToGet: Acquired from reaching Level 12 in the Blizzard game Heroes of the Storm.

name: Alleria
description: When she wants to shoot an apple on your head, you don’t have to worry.  Unless you’re an orc.
howToGet: Acquired from purchasing the Hero Alleria Windrunner.

name: Magni
description: As the eldest of the three Bronzebeard brothers, Magni always got the coolest toys.  He always shared, though!
howToGet: Acquired from purchasing the Hero Magni Bronzebeard.

name: Medivh
description: He certainly has a thing for crows and ravens.
howToGet: Acquired from purchasing the Hero Medivh.

name: Darnassus
description: Nestled in the boughs of a giant tree, Darnassus is the capital city of the night elves.  Also home of the world famous Darnassus Kimchi Pie!
howToGet: Acquired from achieving Rank 20 in Ranked Play, June 2015.

name: Galaxy Gifts
description: Gifts from the Galaxy!  This card back is truly out of this world.
howToGet: Awarded through the Samsung Galaxy Gifts promotion!

name: Darkspear
description: Vol'jin's tribe, the Darkspear trolls, no longer practices cannibalism. Officially.
howToGet: Acquired from achieving Rank 20 in Ranked Play, July 2015.

name: The Grand Tournament
description: After the fall of the Lich King, it was suggested that we celebrate then go home.  Those of us who stayed decided to continue the Tournament with a new mission:  FUN!
howToGet: Was acquired from pre-purchase of The Grand Tournament Card Packs.

name: Tournament Grounds
description: All over The Grand Tournament's grounds, you can find knights at jousting practice. Poor target dummies. So much senseless hay shed on the path to glory...
howToGet: Acquired from achieving Rank 20 in Ranked Play, August 2015.

name: Power Core
description: We can feel the energy in the air. And it's coming from... YOU!
howToGet: Acquired from attending approved eSports events.

name: Exodar
description: The capital city of the draenei is actually a dimensional ship that crash landed on Azeroth after traveling through the Twisting Nether. Despite its wonders and Velen's best efforts, its tourism industry is sluggish due to its remote location (and possibly also the man-eating mutant plants).
howToGet: Acquired from achieving Rank 20 in Ranked Play, September 2015.

name: Highmaul
description: 5 out of 10 ogres agree: this card back is SMASHING!
howToGet: Acquired from achieving Rank 20 in Ranked Play, October 2015.
